channel.title: CVE Feed for TP-Link -- Tapo C200
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TP-Link -- Tapo C200

item.title: CVE-2021-4045|2024-09-17T02:57:31.688Z -- tp-link -- tapo%20c200
item.description: TP-Link Tapo C200 IP camera, on its 1.1.15 firmware version and below, is affected by an unauthenticated RCE vulnerability, present in the uhttpd binary running by default as root. The exploitation of this vulnerability allows an attacker to take full control of the camera.
